short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects to display women's sports in search results when gender is not specified.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser Extension to automatically redirect gender non-specific sports searches to prioritise womens sports and teams. 

Currently works for many European football clubs including those in the WSL, UWCL, Frauen Bundesliga, Liga F, Devision 1 Feminin, Scottish Women's Premier League, and a selection of other European Countries and leagues. Also the NWSL, and a range of Country teams as well. A few other sports such as rugby, tennis, basketball, cricket, etc also work. 

There is a suggestion feature for any teams, clubs, sports, or countries that you think should be included.

Need to update the redirect for countries so that it only redirects if there are additional sports terms included in the search.
